TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_szy_palidas, title = palidas, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Sakizaya]}, url = {https://szy.wikipedia.org/wiki/palidas} }

S.FORM: balidas (Hulam a sulit: 山棕) alangawan nida/sakauzip a mulangaway : madihinay nu kilang a walu a lasubu a lidek nu buyu'. saka cacay a sapihicahi:ca : kapah satangsuyan atu sasaasik atu sapacengceng sapibuting ku banuh. saka tusa a sapihicahi:ca : mangaduway a liuc sapisanga' tu saasik. saka tulu a sapihicahi:ca : asu' ka'nen tu dungec nu balidas.

balidas (Holam a solit: 山棕) alangawan nida/sakaozip a molangaway : madihinay no kilang a walo a lasobo a lidek no boyo'. saka cacay a sapihicahi:ca : kapah satangsoyan ato sasaasik ato sapacengceng sapiboting ko banoh. saka tosa a sapihicahi:ca : mangadoway a lioc sapisanga' to saasik. saka tolo a sapihicahi:ca : aso' ka'nen to dongec no balidas.
